channel.title: New Server MirroredGaming
channel.description:
Server-Features:
Custom cosmetic overrides Zombies Onslaught Minigame Custom Dungeoneering Two different systems 753 Items/Interfaces Bossing contracts All skills working Flawless instant switching Automated double exp weekends great staff
Here is the video of the server http://youtu.be/F2TGjNdvxw0
downloadable client hopefully get a webclient soon https://www.dropbox.com/s/1djwnoiniwe16h5/MirroredGaming.jar
